titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious proclamation for the incouraging the subjects of the United Provinces of the Low Countries, to transport themselves with their estates, and to settle in his Majesties Kingdom of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh, the twenty ninth day of June, and of our Reign the twenty fourth year, 1672.
Signed: Tho. Hay, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
